description: A massive junkyard on the outskirts of Goa Kingdom where unwanted people and trash are dumped. It's a lawless area inhabited by pirates, criminals, and the impoverished.

keyEvents.title: Porchemy Tortures Luffy at Gray Terminal
keyEvents.description: Porchemy interrogates and tortures young Luffy at an abandoned ship in Gray Terminal to extract information about stolen treasure.
keyEvents.significance: This location serves as the setting for a pivotal moment testing Luffy's loyalty to his friends.

keyEvents.title: Ace and Sabo Rescue Luffy
keyEvents.description: Ace and Sabo break into the location where Porchemy is holding Luffy and engage in combat to rescue him.
keyEvents.significance: The rescue operation that solidifies the bond between the three brothers.

statusHistory.reason: Gray Terminal continues to exist during this flashback period

description: A mountain area on Dawn Island where the Dadan Family hideout is located. This becomes the home base for Ace, Luffy, and Sabo during their childhood.

keyEvents.title: Sabo Joins the Dadan Family
keyEvents.description: After the incident with Porchemy, Sabo decides to stay at Mt. Colubo with the Dadan Family alongside Ace and Luffy.
keyEvents.significance: Mt. Colubo becomes the home for all three brothers, where they train and grow together.

statusHistory.reason: Mt. Colubo remains an active location

description: The hideout of the Dadan Family mountain bandits located on Mt. Colubo. This serves as the childhood home for Luffy, Ace, and Sabo.

keyEvents.title: Dadan Accepts Sabo
keyEvents.description: The Dadan Family discusses the situation with the Bluejam Pirates and accepts Sabo as a new member of their household.
keyEvents.significance: The hideout becomes the gathering place for the three brothers.
